verses.name: Job 8:1
verses.text: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,

verses.name: Job 8:2
verses.text: How long wilt thou speak these things? and how long shall the words of thy mouth be like a strong wind?

verses.name: Job 8:3
verses.text: Doth God pervert judgment? or doth the Almighty pervert justice?

verses.name: Job 8:4
verses.text: If thy children have sinned against him, and he have cast them away for their transgression;

verses.name: Job 8:5
verses.text: If thou wouldest seek unto God betimes, and make thy supplication to the Almighty;

verses.name: Job 8:6
verses.text: If thou wert pure and upright; surely now he would awake for thee, and make the habitation of thy righteousness prosperous.
